text: Brian Russell De Palma (born September 11, 1940) is an American movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Newark, New Jersey to Italian American Roman Catholic parents Anthony De Palma (1904-2005) and Vivienne (née Muti). He was raised in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and in New Hampshire."Brian De Palma Biography (1940–)". Film Reference. Retrieved 2012-01-14. De Palma directed Carrie, The Fury, Dressed to Kill, Blow Out, Scarface, Body Double, Wise Guys, The Untouchables, Casualties of War, The Bonfire of the Vanities, Raising Cain, Carlito's Way, Mission: Impossible, Snake Eyes, Mission to Mars, Femme Fatale and The Black Dahlia. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Actors from New Hampshire Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:American movie actors Category:American movie editors Category:American television actors Category:Movie directors from New Jersey Category:Movie directors from Pennsylvania Category:Movie producers from New Jersey Category:Movie producers from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from Newark, New Jersey Category:Screenwriters from New Jersey Category:Screenwriters from Pennsylvania Category:Writers from New Hampshire Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:1940 births Category:Living people
title: Brian De Palma
